title: Tefa Initiation for Women
short_description: A traditional Ifa initiation ceremony for women in Ijebu-Ife, involving spiritual rites and Yoruba religious practices to honor Ifa traditions.

images.description: Video still from Tefa initiation in Eposo Remo, near Ijebu-Ife, showing women in traditional white attire during the ceremony.

title: Agemo Festival
short_description: A regional Ijebu festival honoring the Agemo deity, with Ijebu-Ife priests participating in rituals, prayers for fertility, and community celebrations.

images.description: Priests in colorful traditional attire performing rituals during the Agemo Festival in Ijebuland.

title: Celebration of Rear Admiral Oguntuga
short_description: A community event in Ijebu-Ife honoring Rear Admiral Kolawole Oguntuga for his Nigerian Navy service, attended by dignitaries like Governor Dapo Abiodun.

images.description: Rear Admiral Oguntuga with traditional leaders and dignitaries at the Ijebu-Ife palace during the celebration.

title: Ajalorun Coronation Anniversary
short_description: Annual celebration of Oba Adesesan Oguntayo’s coronation as Ajalorun, featuring community prayers, cultural displays, and palace festivities.

images.description: Oba Adesesan Oguntayo in regal attire during coronation anniversary celebrations at Ijebu-Ife palace.

title: Ijebu-Ife Christian Association Palace Prayers
short_description: Weekly interdenominational prayers by the Ijebu-Ife Christian Association at the Ajalorun’s palace for community peace and prosperity.

images.description: Community members gathered at the Ijebu-Ife palace for weekly Christian prayers.

title: Ijebu-Ife Community Health Outreach
short_description: A health initiative supported by the Ajalorun, providing free eye tests, medical checkups, and supplies to Ijebu-Ife residents.

images.description: Medical personnel attending to residents during a health outreach at Ijebu-Ife General Hospital.
